content:
```xml
<repairs>
DEL_EDGE | (rm) | -
</repairs>
```

This repair operation removes the existing relationship between the patient "Sanford861" and the medication "24 HR Glucophage 500 MG Extended Release Oral Tablet," which contains an ingredient "ferrous sulfate" to which the patient is allergic. This ensures that the patient is not treated with a medicine containing an allergen.
